column1: Amazon Elastic Load Balancing (US East (N. Virginia))

Increased budget was used to scale up some of the essential resources that have significant effect on the app performance.
Following decisions were made while using the extra budget.
- EC2 instance types were changed with high performance instance type which provides more RAM, CPU and Network performance
- RDS database instance type was changed with a higher performance instance. Also, the space for DB instance was doubled and instead of general SSD stoarage Provisioned IOPS SSD was used in order have a better database performance
- 2 ElastiCache instances were added to incerease the speed and performance of the app and decrease unnecessary load on the DB
- CloudWatch alarms were added that can be used for receving notification when app performance decrease or any other issue happens
- AWS SNS service was added that can be used for CloudWatch alarms and other app notifications
